UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user of the Magicpixa application.

uid.description: Unique identifier for the user, from Firebase Auth.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

credits.description: Number of credits the user has. Resets monthly based on their plan.

subscriptionStartDate.description: The date when the current subscription plan started, used for monthly credit reset.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

GeneratedImage.title: GeneratedImage
GeneratedImage.description: Represents an image generated by the user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the generated image.

userId.description: ID of the user who generated the image.

originalImageUrl.description: URL of the original uploaded image.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the image was generated.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores all information for a user, including their profile and credit balance. This simplifies data fetching.

/users/{userId}/generatedImages/{imageId.description: Stores a collection of images generated by the user.
